q: In the cold opening to last night's Late Show with David Letterman , an awkward green-room encounter between the host and guest, Justin Bieber , culminated with the teenage sensation sheepishly admitting to Dave's suspicion when he said, Yeah- you have no idea who I am, do you? Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. `` In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page

Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama .`` He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure,'' Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible Barack Obamaial candidate himself. Colin Powell said he questioned Sen. John McCain 's judgment in picking Gov. Sarah Palin as his running mate because

services company Siemens and Spanish wind power developer Gamesa announced Thursday they had signed initial contracts to build wind turbine factories and a research center at the port of Hull and in Dundee and Glasgow, respectively. The race for offshore wind manufacturing jobs is on(...) I'm determined the UK economy benefits from the opportunities and jobs of the offshore wind supply chain, said Energy and Climate Change Secretary Chris Huhne . Together these projects would create up to 1,000 jobs at a time when workers across the country are increasingly worried about losing employment amid severe government spending cuts.

Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''
